title: Skeleton (disambiguation)
content:
Skeleton may refer to:

Contents

  • 1 Monsters
    • 1.1 Other Skeletal Monsters
  • 2 Items
  • 3 Other

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Skeleton - common skeletons, found across Gielinor
  • Skeleton (Tarn's Lair) - skeletons found in the Abandoned Mine and Tarn's Lair, some of which animate from piles of bones on the floor when the player is near
    • Skeleton (mage) - magic-using skeletons found in Tarn's Lair
  • Skeleton (Barrows) - level 77 skeletons found in the Barrows minigame, which once killed contribute to the minigame's rewards
  • Skeleton (Shayzien Crypts) - level 132 skeletons found in the Shayzien Crypts, which each attack with a different combat style
  • Skeleton (Melzar's Maze) - found in Melzar's Maze, killed for the yellow key to progress through the maze
  • Skeleton (Ape Atoll) - giant monkey skeletons found in the Ape Atoll Dungeon, aggressive to humans but not to players disguised using a monkey greegree
  • Skeleton (Draynor Manor) - a unique skeleton found in Draynor Manor, which attacks the player when they take the rubber tube
  • Skeleton (The Restless Ghost) - a skeleton that animates from a nearby pile of bones in the Wizards' Tower basement to attack the player when they pick up the ghost's skull
  • Skeleton guard - a level 22 skeleton that can be built using the Construction skill
  • Skeleton (Enakhra's Lament) - a skeleton briefly seen in a cutscene during the Enakhra's Lament quest, animated by Enakhra to serve as a weapon for her lord Zamorak
  • Skeleton (Wrath Altar) - unattackable level 35 skeletons found across the chasm in the Wrath Altar.

Other Skeletal Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Skeleton Mage
  • Skeleton (Malignius Mortifer)
  • Giant skeleton
  • Skeletal Wyvern

  • Skeleton thug
  • Skeleton Champion
  • Skeletal miner
  • Skeleton fremennik
  • Skeleton Hellhound
    • Skeleton Hellhound (Vet'ion)
    • Greater Skeleton Hellhound
  • Skeletal mystic

    • Skeleton gloves
  • Skeleton champion scroll

  • Skeleton (2018 Halloween event)
    • Dead person

If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

'''Skeleton''' may refer to:

===Monsters===
*[[Skeleton]] - common skeletons, found across [[Gielinor]]
*[[Skeleton (Tarn's Lair)]] - skeletons found in the [[Abandoned Mine]] and [[Tarn's Lair]], some of which animate from piles of bones on the floor when the player is near
**[[Skeleton (mage)]] - magic-using skeletons found in [[Tarn's Lair]]
*[[Skeleton (Barrows)]] - level 77 skeletons found in the [[Barrows]] minigame, which once killed contribute to the minigame's rewards
*[[Skeleton (Shayzien Crypts)]] - level 132 skeletons found in the [[Shayzien Crypts]], which each attack with a different combat style
*[[Skeleton (Melzar's Maze)]] - found in [[Melzar's Maze]], killed for the [[Key (Melzar's Maze)|yellow key]] to progress through the maze
*[[Skeleton (Ape Atoll)]] - giant monkey skeletons found in the [[Ape Atoll Dungeon]], aggressive to humans but not to players disguised using a [[monkey greegree]]
*[[Skeleton (Draynor Manor)]] - a unique skeleton found in [[Draynor Manor]], which attacks the player when they take the [[rubber tube]]
*[[Skeleton (The Restless Ghost)]] - a skeleton that animates from a nearby pile of bones in the [[Wizards' Tower]] basement to attack the player when they pick up the [[ghost's skull]]
*[[Skeleton guard]] - a level 22 skeleton that can be built using the [[Construction]] skill
*[[Skeleton (Enakhra's Lament)]] - a skeleton briefly seen in a cutscene during the [[Enakhra's Lament]] [[quest]], animated by [[Enakhra]] to serve as a weapon for her lord [[Zamorak]]
*[[Skeleton (Wrath Altar)]] - unattackable level 35 skeletons found across the chasm in the [[Wrath Altar]].
